name: Lost Daughter
description:
Lost Daughter is an open-world action game which tells the story of Sawyer trying to find his daughter.

Sawyer wakes up in a hospital remembering nothing but he has a daughter. He will go into troubles while searching for his daughter.

Key Features

  • Open-world
  • Huge map
  • Use special powers eating hamburgers, sandwiches and drinking water, coffee and coke
  • Realistic car controls
  • Many guns
  • In-game comics to tell the story
  • Stalk any character
